Description:
We are looking for a Recruitment Business Partner to join our Firm and help develop and implement successful recruiting strategies.The Recruitment Business Partner responsibilities include coordinating with hiring managers, identifying job requirements and determining qualification criteria for candidates.Ultimately, you will ensure we attract and hire the most qualified candidates who cover our hiring needs, meet our long-term objectives and add to our company culture.ResponsibilitiesPartner with hiring managers to identify current and future personnel needs
Determine optimal job advertising mix, including job boards, careers pages and social networks
Craft sourcing strategies using online channels
Review job descriptions to ensure they capture role requirements and use inclusive language
Advise recruiters and hiring managers on interviewing and evaluation methods
Calculate recruiting KPIs (e.g time-to-hire and time-to-fill)
Report on monthly, quarterly and annual recruitment projects and budget
Develop and distribute candidate experience surveysSkills
